explains: adj. 高性能的；高效能的

sentences.en: Extreme high-performance sports may lead to optimal cardiovascular performance, but they quite certainly do not prolong life.
sentences.cn: 极限高强度运动可能会带来最佳的心血管功能，但这些运动肯定无法延长寿命。

sentences.en: Finally, with the dual-core processor and high-performance video card, it can be unimpeded when you play online games and watch videos.
sentences.cn: 最后，它配有双核处理器和高性能显卡，在玩网络游戏和观看视频时不受阻碍。

sentences.en: The measurement of urine kynurenic is acid by high-performance liquid chromatography.
sentences.cn: 用高效液相色谱法测定尿中尿碱含量。
